profileAlternative.name: Nitika Lakhotia
profileAlternative.headline: Front End UI/UX Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS and Javascript at None
profileAlternative.summary:
I am a Front End UI/UX Developer with expertise in HTML, CSS and Javascript. Based on these technologies, I had worked on three key projects:
1. Battleship Game --> This is a web application where a user's aim is to destroy all the ships in a battle grid. This project was done using the MVC Design pattern.
2. Sticky Note --> This is a web application where user could manage his tasks on different colorful notes which was part of user interface. Further, more interactions in form of zoom and shadows were provided for a natural look and feel.
3. Thirst Quencher --> This is a web application where user could order and customize drinks. Project also involved handling cross browser compatibility issues.

Previously, I have a total of 1.5 years industrial experience with 1 year experience with NIIT Ltd. as Corporate Trainer and 6 months in WebTek Labs as Software Tester respectively.

positions.title: Software Tester
positions.description:
* Tested a shopping cart software used in e-commerce to assist online shopping and
merchant management
* Tested the web based administrator module of the software by manual testing and tools like
QTP
* Designed test plan and executed test cases followed by logging of bugs and regression as a
part of the Bug Life Cycle
* Reported more than 1,000 bugs with tags including its type, severity and status maintaining
the Bug Life Cycle
